text: 15.5: Ro 12.16; 1 Ko 1.10; 9.9-10; Fi 3.16Fhe Bakɨme, ana nduara havharar nza ndɨɨv, ana nduara nza mbuim, nza ndavi havhargiap, nza havhargia thivgiap, simtɨgi ndi. Maaŋ muuŋgiap, Fhe Bakɨme nden kurkurarga, nde guigira Krais Zisasan tɨvi zɨn ŋgɨp, nde mba ndɨkndɨga bavira suirav kɨv, nde ndava bavira wari kɨri.
